name: Pilots Together
description:
A game about 9 space pilots fighting the Swarm!

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1, by 8 developers (See below)

Very buggy. Maybe winnable? Definitely losable.

Also, there is currently only one level, not 3 as said in-game.

Enjoy!
